juzs.text: Li dir mi ne tell vi vi star cannot est me
Li dir mi pet vi pri anything aux tiam do ne keep me vi! Vi seg suficx apologies me
Tial ili ir. When ili reached nepr community ili pet popol food ili rifuz host them! Baldaux ili trov mur collapse li fiks gxi! Li dir Vi postul wage ke
Li dir Nun ni part kompani. Mi eksplik vi cxio vi ne star
As por sxip gxi aparten al poor fishermen mi wanted render gxi defective tie est regx ven post them konfisk cxiu sxip forcibly
As por knab his parents est bon believers ni seg li sxargx them his transgression disbelief
Ni willed your Lord substitute his met another fil; unu est put righteousness kindness

As por mur gxi aparten al 2 orf knab urb. Sub tie est trezor aparten al them. Because their patr est righteous hom your Lord wanted them al kresk ating plen strength tiam ekstrakt their trezor! Such est mercy your Lord Mi did neniom da ke de my own volition. This est explanation ajx vi ne star
Ili pet vi Zul-Qarnain. dir mi narrate vi kelk da his histori
Ni granted him auxtoritat ter proviz him all kinds da means
Tiam li pursued unu voj
When li reached far okcident li trov sun setting vast ocean trov popol tie! Ni dir O Zul-Qarnain vi regul as vi wish either pun est kind al them
Li dir As por those transgress ni pun them; tiam when ili return their Lord Li commit them mult retribution
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev bon rekompenc; ni trakt them kindly
Tiam li pursued another voj
When li reached far orient li trov sun roz popol hav nothing sxirm them el gxi
Naturally ni est fully aware da cxio li trov
Li tiam pursued another voj
When li reached val 2 palisades li trov popol whose idiom est barely understandable
Ili dir O Zul-Qarnain Gog Magog est corruptors ter. Ni pag vi Can kre barrier us them
Li dir My Lord don me great bounties. Vi cooperate me mi cxarpent dam vi them
Bring me mes de glad. Once li filled gap 2 palisades li dir Blov. Once est rugx hot li dir Help me versx gudr gxi
Tiel ili ne grimp gxi nor could ili bor tru gxi
Li dir This est mercy my Lord When prophecy my Lord ven pas Li kauxz dam cxif! prophecy my Lord est truth
Je ke temp, ni let them invad 1 another tiam korn blov ni summon them all together
Ni prezent Infer ke tag disbelievers
Ili est unu okul tro vual seg My message Nor could ili auxd
those disbelieve opini ili get setting My servants di Me Ni prepar disbelievers Infer etern abode
dir mi tell vi mav losers est
Ili est unu works en this life est totally astray ili opini ili doing bon
Such est des unu disbelieved revelations de their Lord en meeting Him! Do their works est en vain Tag Resurrection ili ne hav weight
Their just requital est Infer dors their disbelief kaj por mok My revelations My messengers
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ind blissful Paradise their abode
Forever ili abide therein; ili neniam want any ali substitute
Dir ocean est ink vort my Lord ocean kur out vort my Lord kur out eben se ni double ink supply
dir mi est ne plur than human vi inspir ke your di est 1 di! Those esper meet their Lord work righteousness neniam worship any ali di his Lord
Y ‘A. S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa ‘Ayn Saad)
narration your Lord's mercy towards His servant Zachariah
Li vok his Lord sekret vok
Li dir My Lord ost torn brittle my korp my har est aflame kun griz! As mi implore Vi my Lord mi neniam despair
Mi worry my dependants me my wife est sterile Grant me Vi heir
Let him est my heir heir Jacob's clan far him my Lord acceptable
O Zachariah ni don vi bon news knab nom est John (Yahya). Ni neniam kre anyone him antaux
Li dir My Lord mi hav fil my wife's sterility my old agx
Li dir Tiel dir your Lord est facil Me do Mi kre vi antaux ke, vi est nothing
Li dir My Lord don me sign. Li dir Your sign est ti vi ne parol al popol 3 consecutive nokt
Li ven his famili sanctuary signaled them Medit Di tag kaj nokt
O John vi uphold scripture strongly. Ni dot him kun wisdom, ecx his youth
Kaj (ni dot him kun) kindness el us purity li est righteous
Li honor his parents est neniam disobedient tiran
Pac est upon him tag li est bor, tag li mort tag li resurrected dors life
Menci scripture Mary! Sxi izol her famili eastern location
While barrier apart her el them ni send al her our Spirit Li ir her en form human est
Sxi dir mi streb rifugx en plej Gracious ke vi est righteous
Li dir mi est messenger your Lord grant vi pur fil
Sxi dir Kiel can mi hav fil when ne hom tusx me mi neniam est unchaste
Li dir Tiel dir your Lord ‘Gxi est facil por Me Ni render him sign popol mercy el us. This est predestined materi
When sxi bor him sxi izol faraway met
Nask process ven her trunk palm arb Sxi dir (mi est hont;) Mi wish mi est dead antaux this okaz completely forges
infant vok her her dir ne grieve Your Lord proviz vi stream
Vi sxancel trunk de this palm arb gxi gut ripe dat vi
Mangx trink est felicx! When vi seg anyone dir ‘mi far vow silence mi ne talking hodiaux anyone
Sxi ven her famili port him. Ili dir O Mary vi committed io est totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron your patr ne est mav hom nor est your mother unchaste
Sxi pint him. Ili dir Kiel ni talk kun infant crib
infant parol dir mi est servant DI. Li don me scripture appointed me prophet
Li far me ben wherever mi ir enjoined me observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat) as long as mi viv
Mi est honor my mother Li ne far me disobedient ribel
Pac est me tag mi est bor, tag mi mort tag mi get resurrected
Est Jesus fil Mary this est truth this materi which ili ad dub
Gxi ne befit DI ke Li begets fil Li glor. Al hav anything done Li simply dir al Est gxi est
Li ankaux proklam DI est my Lord your Lord vi worship Him sol! This est dekstr path
(various parti disput themselves regarding identity Jesus). Do ve al those disbelieve sight terrible tag
Wait gxis vi auxd them seg them when ili ven vizagx us! transgressors ke tag totally perd
avert them tag remorse when judgment issued Ili est totally oblivious; ili ne kred
Ni est des unu hered ter everyone gxi; us everyone returned
Menci scripture Abraham; li est saint prophet
Li dir al his patr O my patr vi worship ki can nek auxd nor seg nor help vi en any voj
O my patr mi ricev nepr knowledge ke vi ne ricev. sekv me mi direkt vi rekt path
O my patr ne worship diabl. Diabl ribel kontraux plej Gracious
O my patr mi tim lest vi incur retribution el plej Gracious tiam igx ally diabl
Li dir vi forsaken my di O Abraham? Vi stop mi sxton vi. las me
Li dir Pac est vi. Mi implore my Lord forgive vi; Li est Kind me
Mi abandon vi di vi worship DI. Mi worship nur my Lord Per imploring my Lord sol mi ne ir wrong
Li abandoned them di ili worshipped DI ni granted him Isaac Jacob ni far each da them prophet
Ni dusx them our mercy ni granted them honorable pozici histori
Menci scripture Moses Li devoted li est messenger prophet
Ni vok him dekstr flank Mount Sinai. Ni brought him confer him
Kaj ni granted him our mercy his frat Aaron prophet
Menci scripture Ismail! Li est truthful when li far promes li est messenger prophet
Li uz enjoin his famili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat;) li est acceptable al his Lord
Menci scripture Idris! Li est saint prophet
Ni raised him honorable rang

These est kelk da prophets whom DI ben Ili chosen descendants Adam descendants de those ni port Noah descendants de Abraham Israel el those ni direkt selected When revelations plej Gracious est recited them ili fal prostrate plor
Post them Li substituted generaci perd Kontakt Prayers (Salat) pursued their lusts Ili sufer consequences
Nur those pent kred, plumb righteous life enter Paradise malplej injustice
Gxarden Eden await them as promes per plej Gracious those worship Him ecx privacy! Certainly His promes ven pas
Ili ne auxd any nonsense therein; nur pac. Ili ricev their provisions therein tag kaj nokt
Such est Paradise; ni grant gxi those our servants est righteous
Ni ne ven ordon your Lord Al Him aparten our preter our future cxio inter them! Your Lord est neniam forgetful
Lord de heavens ter cxio them; vi worship Him steadfastly persevere en worshipping Him! Vi kon de anyone Do egal Him
human est pet "Post mi mort mi ven life
human est forges ke ni Did kre him jam li est nothing
Per your Lord ni certainly summon them together diabl gather them around Infer humiliated
Tiam ni pik each grup plej ardent opponent de plej Gracious
Ni kon plen put those est ind de brul therein
Cxiu single 1 de vi seg gxi; this est irrevocable decision your Lord
Tiam ni rescue righteous las transgressors gxi humiliated
When our revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve dir al those kred Which de us est prosperous? Which de us est majority
Many generaci hav ni annihilated them; ili est powerful prosperous
Dir Those choose ir astray plej Gracious vol plumb them sur gxis ili seg ki promes them! - either retribution Hor. Ke est when ili trov out who really est mav off weaker en potenc
DI EG guidance DE those choose DIREKT. Por bon deeds eternally rekompenc your Lord bring far put returns
Vi not unu rejected our revelations tiam dir mi est don wealth infan
Li seg future Li pren such pledge el plej Gracious
Ja ni record ki li utters tiam commit him al ever-increasing retribution
Tiam ni hered cxio li posed li ven us all sol
Ili worship DI ali di (ili pens) est help them
Sur des contrary ili reject their idolatry est their enemies
Vi ne seg kiel ni unleash diabl disbelievers Do emoci them up
Est impatient ni prepar them kelk preparation
Tag ven when ni summon righteous antaux plej Gracious en grup
Ni herd kulp al Infer, est their etern abode
Ne 1 posed potenc intercede those conform legx de plej Gracious
Ili dir plej Gracious begotten fil
Vi uttered gross blasphemy
heavens est pri frakas ter est pri al larm asunder mont est pri cxif
Because ili pretend ke plej Gracious begotten fil
Gxi ne befitting plej Gracious ke Li beget fil
Cxiu single 1 en heavens ter est servant de plej Gracious
Li encompassed them counted them 1 per
All da them ven Him Tag Resurrection individu
Surely those kred plumb righteous life plej Gracious vol dusx them kun am
Ni do far this (Quran) elucidated your lang en ord liver bon news al righteous al avert kun gxi opponents
Many generaci them ni annihilated vi perceive can any da them auxd el them any son
H
Ni ne reveal Quran vi kauxz vi any hardship
Nur al remind des reverent
revelation el Creator ter alt heavens
Plej Gracious; Li assumed all auxtoritat
Al Him aparten cxio heavens ter cxio them cxio muel
(Vi deklar your convictions ne) Li kon sekret ki ecx kasx
DI tie NE est ALI DI Him. Al Him aparten plej bel nom
Vi not histori Moses
When li seg fajr li dir al his famili Rest here. Mi seg fajr. Maybe mi bring vi kelk da gxi trov kelk guidance fajr
When li ven gxi li est vok O Moses
Mi est your Lord remove your sandals! Vi est sankt val Tuwaa
Mi chosen vi tial auxskult al ki revealed
Mi est DI; tie ne est ali di Me Vi worship Me sol observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) memor Me
(Hor end de mond) surely ven; mi keep gxi preskaux kasx each anim est pag por its works
Ne diverted therefrom per those ne kred en gxi! - those pursue their own opinions - lest vi fal
Ki est this en your dekstr man Moses
Li dir This est my stab. Mi apog gxi herd my sxaf gxi mi uz gxi ali purposes
Li dir Jxet gxi down Moses
Li jxet gxi down whereupon gxi torn into mov serpent
Li dir Pik gxi ne est afraid! Ni return gxi its original sxtat
Kaj ten your man your wing gxi ven blank blemish another proof
Ni tiel montr vi kelk da our great portents
Ir Pharaoh li transgressed
Li dir My Lord cool my temper
far this materi facil me
Kaj untie nod my lang
Tial ili kompren my speech
Kaj appoint assistant por me my famili
My frat Aaron
Strengthen me him
Let him est my partner en this materi
Ke ni glor Vi frequently
Kaj commemorate Vi frequently
Vi est Seer de us
Li dir Your request granted O Moses
Ni ben vi re
When ni revealed your mother ki ni revealed
Dir ‘Jxet him boks tiam jxet him into river! River jxet him bord pik enemy de Min enemy his. ' mi dusx vi kun am Me mi hav vi far My watchful okul

Your sister marsx them dir ‘mi tell vi nursing mother pren bon zorg de him. ' Ni tiel returned vi your mother ke sxi est felicx stop worrying Kaj when vi killed ul ni sav vi grievous consequences; ja ni tested vi thoroughly. Vi rest jar popol Midyan tuj vi ven en accordance kun preciz plan
Mi far vi just Me
Ir your frat supported per My sign ne waver en memor Me
Ir Pharaoh li transgressed
Parol al him nicely; li pren heed igx reverent
Ili dir Our Lord ni tim lest li atak us transgress
Li dir est afraid mi est vi auxskult watching
Ir him dir ‘Ni est 2 messengers el your Lord Let Infan Israel ir! Vi refrain el persekut them! Ni bring sign your Lord pac est lot de those heed guidance
‘Ni inspir retribution inevitably aflikt those disbelieve turn
Li dir Who est your Lord O Moses
Li dir Our Lord est 1 who granted cxio its existence its guidance
Li dir Ki pri preter generaci
Li dir knowledge thereof est my Lord record My Lord neniam erar nor does Li forges
Li est Unu far ter habitable vi paved en gxi roads vi. Li send down cxiel akv which ni produkt many different kinds plant
Mangx raise your livestock! These est sufficient proofs those posed intelligence
El gxi ni kre vi gxi ni return vi el gxi ni bring vi out re
Ni montr him all our proofs li disbelieved rifuz
Li dir vi ven here sorb us our land your magic O Moses
Ni surely montr vi simil magic Do set appointment ke nek ni nor vi violate; neuxtral met
Li dir Your appointed temp est tag festivities. all meet forenoon
Pharaoh summoned his forces tiam ven
Moses dir al them Ve al vi. Vi fabricate mensog batal DI Do do incur His retribution? Such fabricators surely fail
Ili disput themselves as ili conferred privately
Ili dir These 2 est ne plur than magicians wish sorb vi your land their magic al detru your ideal voj da life
agree upon 1 scheme vizagx them united front! winner hodiaux hav upper man
Ili dir O Moses either vi jxet ni est 1 jxet
Li dir Vi jxet. Whereupon their sxnur baston aper him their magic as ili mov
Moses harbored kelk tim
Ni dir ne Hav tim! Vi prevail
Jxet ki vi ten en your dekstr man gxi hirund ki ili fabricated ki ili fabricated est ne plur than scheming magician. magician's work ne sukces
magicians fal prostrate dir Ni kred en Lord de Aaron Moses

Li dir Did vi kred en him my permission? Li est your cxef; unu instru vi magic Mi surely sever your man fut altern flank. Mi crucify vi palm trunk. Vi do gxi trov out which de us inflict mav retribution who outlasts whom
Ili dir Ni ne prefer vi klar proofs ke ven us kaj Unu kre us! Do issue whatever judgment vi wish issue Vi nur regul en this lowly life
Ni hav kred en our Lord ti Li forgive us our pek magic ke vi forced us perform DI est far PUT Everlasting
Anyone ven his Lord kulp vol incur Infer wherein li neniam mort nor rest alive
As por those ven Him believers plumb righteous life ili ating alt rang
Gxarden Eden beneath which river flu est their abode forever Such est rekompenc those purify
Ni inspir Moses Plumb My servants out strik them sek road mar. Vi ne tim vi kapt nor shall vi worry
Pharaoh pursued them kun his trup mar overwhelmed them as gxi est destin overwhelm them
Tiel Pharaoh misled his popol; li ne direkt them
O Infan Israel ni liver vi your enemy summoned vi Mount Sinai ni send down al vi manna quails
Mangx bon ajx ni proviz por vi ne transgress lest vi incur My wrath. Whoever incurs My wrath fal
Mi surely Forgiving those pent kred plumb righteous life steadfastly ceter direkt
Why vi rush for your popol O Moses
Li dir Ili est close me Mi rushed Vi my Lord ti Vi placx
Li dir Ni put your popol test vi las Samarian misled them
Moses returned his popol koler disappointed dir O my popol your Lord ne promes vi bon promes? Vi ne wait Vi want Did incur wrath el your Lord this why vi est romp your agreement me
Ili dir Ni ne romp our agreement vi sur purpose Ni loaded jewelry decid jxet our loads en! This est ki Samarian sugest
Li produkt them sculpted calf komplet calf's son! Ili dir This est your di di Moses Do li forges
Ili ne seg gxi nek respond them nor posed any potenc harm them benefit them
Aaron told them O my popol this est test vi. Your nur Lord est plej Gracious tial sekv me obe my ordon
Ili dir Ni ad worship gxi Moses ven
Moses dir O Aaron ki est gxi prevent vi when vi seg them ir astray
El sekv my mend? Vi ribel me
Li dir O fil my mother do ne tir me my barb my kap. Mi est afraid ke vi dir ‘Vi divid Infan Israel disobeyed my mend
Li dir Ki est des materi vi O Samarian
Li dir mi seg ki ili ne seg. Mi grabbed fistful (de polv) met kie messenger star uz gxi miks golden calf This est ki my mens inspir me do
Li dir Tiam ir your life do ne eben ven close Vi hav appointed temp your final judgment vi neniam evade Jen your di vi uz worship ni brul gxi jxet gxi into mar al rest down tie forever
Your nur di est DI; 1 beside whom tie ne est ali di. His knowledge encompasses all ajx
Ni tiel narrate vi kelk news el generaci. Ni revealed vi message el us
Those disregard gxi bor load (de pek) Tag Resurrection
Eternally ili abide therein; ki miserable load Tag Resurrection
Ke est tag when korn blov ni summon kulp ke tag blu
(Flustr themselves ili dir Vi rest 1 life) ne plur than 10 tag
Ni est fully aware da their utterances. Plej accurate among them dir Vi rest ne plur than tag
Ili pet vi mont. Dir My Lord visx them out
Li las them barren plat land
Ne eben slightest hill testament vi seg therein nor tremp
Ke tag everyone sekv caller slightest deviation. All son hushed antaux plej Gracious; vi auxd nothing flustr
Ke tag intercession est useless escept por those permes plej Gracious whose utterances conform His vol
Li kon their preter their future while neniom encompasses His knowledge
All vizagx submit Viv Etern those who sxargx their transgressions fail
As por those worked righteousness while kred ili ne hav tim de injustice adversity
Ni tiel revealed gxi Arabic Quran ni cited en gxi all kinds da prophecies ili sav gxi kauxz them sorb heed
Exalted est DI nur prav Regx! Ne rush uttering Quran gxi revealed vi dir My Lord increase my knowledge
Ni tested Adam en des preter, li forges ni trov him indecisive
Recall ti ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam. Ili fal prostrate Satan; li rifuz
Ni tiam dir O Adam this est enemy de vi your wife. Ne let him evict vi Paradise lest vi igx miserable
Vi garanti neniam hunger therein nor ir unsheltered
Nor vol vi soif therein nor sufer any hejt
Diabl flustr him dir O Adam let me montr vi arb eternity unending kingship
Ili mangx el gxi, whereupon their korp igx visible al them ili pen kovr foli Paradise! Adam tiel disobeyed his Lord fal
Subsequently his Lord chose him redeemed him direkt him
Li dir Ir down therefrom all da vi! Vi est enemies de 1 another When guidance ven vi Me anyone sekv My guidance ne ir astray nor sufer any mizer
As por 1 who disregards My message li hav amiserable life ni resurrect him Tag Resurrection blind
Li dir My Lord do gxi vi summon me blind when mi did uz est seer
Li dir vi forges our revelations when ili ven vi vi tuj forges
Ni tiel requite those transgress rifuz kred en revelations their Lord retribution Hereafter est far mav everlasting
Gxi Does ever occur them kiel many previous generaci ni annihilated Ili tuj marsx hejm de those antaux them. These est sign those posed intelligence
Se ne est your Lord's predetermined plan ili jugx tuj
Do est pacient en des vizagx de their utterances lauxd glor your Lord antaux sunrise antaux sunset! Dum nokt glor Him tro as ambaux ends tag vi est felicx
Ne covet ki ni bestowed any ali popol! Such est temporary ornaments this life whereby ni put them test ki your Lord proviz por vi est far put everlasting
Vi enjoin your famili observ kontakt prayers (Salat) steadfastly persevere en doing tial. Ni ne pet vi any provisions ni est des unu proviz por vi. ultimate triumf aparten al des righteous
Ili dir li nur montr us mirakl el his Lord ili ne ricev sufficient mirakl previous messages
Hav ni annihilated them this ili dir Our Lord hav Vi send messenger us ni sekv Your revelations evit this fi humiliation
Dir All da us waiting wait vi testament surely trov out who est gxust path who ver direkt
